str2: (a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Intrans: I am silent, keep silence; trans: I keep secret; pass: I am kept secret. From sige; to keep silent.
The same as Iakob Graecized; Jacobus, the name of three Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
